title: Zoning change for SLU Med Rec. Complex

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.  98 INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN MARLENE DAVIS    	An Ordinance recommended by the Planning Commission on June 9, 2010, to change the zoning of property as indicated on the District Map, from "F" Neighborhood Commercial District and "J" Industrial District to the "C" Multiple-Family Dwelling District, in City Blocks 2159, 2160, 2163 and 2164 (1201-03, 1101-03, 1105, 1109, 1111, 1113, 1115, 1117, 1121, 1123 & 1125 S. Compton and 3212-14, 3216H, 3218-22, 3226, 3228 & 3230 LaSalle Street, 3302, 3304, 3308, 3310, 3312-16, 3318, 3320, 3322, 3324, 3326, 3328, 3330, 3332 & 3334 LaSalle Street, and 3311 & 3313-33 Rutger), so as to include the described parcels of land in City Blocks 2159, 2160, 2163 and 2164; and containing an emergency clause.
